title: Hostel Outpass System
description: This is a web application that simplifies outpass generation and management for hostel students. Hostel administrators can create customized outpass with fields for departure date, time, reason, and expected return time. The system is available is both web application and mobile application

title: S-Converter
description: Introducing S-Converter, a lightweight desktop application that swiftly converts JPG files to PDF format. Powered by Electron.js, S-Converter offers a seamless and efficient solution for transforming images into portable and universally compatible PDF documents. With S-Converter, users can effortlessly convert JPG files to PDF with just a few clicks. The application's minimalist interface ensures a straightforward user experience, allowing users of all technical levels to navigate the conversion process effortlessly. Simply drag and drop the desired JPG files into S-Converter or use the integrated file explorer to select them manually.

title: Team
description: Team Dashboard is a Node command-line application that takes in information about employees to generate a dynamic HTML web page.
